response.explain: The previous action code successfully moved the robot to the suitcase. The next step is to open the suitcase.
response.subtask:
(1) Register the water bottle and the suitcase (which will be used as a bag).
(2) Move the robot to the water bottle.
(3) Grasp the water bottle.
(4) Move the robot to the suitcase.
(5) Open the suitcase.
(6) Put the water bottle into the suitcase.
(7) Close the suitcase.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 5: Open the suitcase
    suitcase = registry(env, "suitcase_285")
    open(robot, suitcase)
    donothing(env)
